screen.name: CustomerMaster
screen.crud:
SELECT CIN "cin",NRIC "nric",F_NAME "fname",L_NAME "lname",GENDER "gender",DOB "dob",CUST_CATEGORY "custcategory",MAKER_ID "makerid",SEC_QUES "secques",SEC_QUES_ANS "secquesans",MEMBERSHIP_NO "membershipno",CREATION_MODE "creationmode",REG_STATUS "regstatus",SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED "smsblastsubscribed",EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED "emailblastsubscribed",CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED "cardinsurancesubscribed",CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START "cardinsurpolicyyrstart",CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM "cardinsurpolicynum",MOBILE_AT_REG "mobileatreg",PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON "progunsubscribedreason",PRODUCT_TYPE "producttype" FROM CUSTOMER_MASTER select count('x') from CUSTOMER_MASTER
SELECT CIN "cin",NRIC "nric",F_NAME "fname",L_NAME "lname",GENDER "gender",DOB "dob",CUST_CATEGORY "custcategory",MAKER_ID "makerid",SEC_QUES "secques",SEC_QUES_ANS "secquesans",MEMBERSHIP_NO "membershipno",CREATION_MODE "creationmode",REG_STATUS "regstatus",SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED "smsblastsubscribed",EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED "emailblastsubscribed",CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED "cardinsurancesubscribed",CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START "cardinsurpolicyyrstart",CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM "cardinsurpolicynum",MOBILE_AT_REG "mobileatreg",PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON "progunsubscribedreason",PRODUCT_TYPE "producttype" FROM CUSTOMER_MASTER select count('x') from CUSTOMER_MASTER
--NORMAL SQLs-- insert into CUSTOMER_MASTER( CIN, NRIC, F_NAME, L_NAME, GENDER, DOB, CUST_CATEGORY, MAKER_ID, SEC_QUES, SEC_QUES_ANS, MEMBERSHIP_NO, CREATION_MODE, REG_STATUS, SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM, MOBILE_AT_REG, PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON, PRODUCT_TYPE) values ( #inp.form1[0].cin, #inp.form1[0].nric, #inp.form1[0].fname, #inp.form1[0].lname, #inp.form1[0].gender, #inp.form1[0].dob, #inp.form1[0].custcategory, #inp.form1[0].makerid, #inp.form1[0].secques, #inp.form1[0].secquesans, #inp.form1[0].membershipno, #inp.form1[0].creationmode, #inp.form1[0].regstatus, #inp.form1[0].smsblastsubscribed, #inp.form1[0].emailblastsubscribed, #inp.form1[0].cardinsurancesubscribed, #inp.form1[0].cardinsurpolicyyrstart, #inp.form1[0].cardinsurpolicynum, #inp.form1[0].mobileatreg, #inp.form1[0].progunsubscribedreason, #inp.form1[0].producttype) delete from CUSTOMER_MASTER WHERE CIN = #inp.form1[0].cin update CUSTOMER_MASTER set NRIC = #inp.form1[0].nric, F_NAME = #inp.form1[0].fname, L_NAME = #inp.form1[0].lname, GENDER = #inp.form1[0].gender, DOB = #inp.form1[0].dob, CUST_CATEGORY = #inp.form1[0].custcategory, MAKER_ID = #inp.form1[0].makerid, SEC_QUES = #inp.form1[0].secques, SEC_QUES_ANS = #inp.form1[0].secquesans, MEMBERSHIP_NO = #inp.form1[0].membershipno, CREATION_MODE = #inp.form1[0].creationmode, REG_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].regstatus, SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED = #inp.form1[0].smsblastsubscribed, EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED = #inp.form1[0].emailblastsubscribed, CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED = #inp.form1[0].cardinsurancesubscribed, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START = #inp.form1[0].cardinsurpolicyyrstart, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM = #inp.form1[0].cardinsurpolicynum, MOBILE_AT_REG = #inp.form1[0].mobileatreg, PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON = #inp.form1[0].progunsubscribedreason, PRODUCT_TYPE = #inp.form1[0].producttype WHERE CIN=#inp.form1[0].cin --GRID INSERTS (check out which alias is required-- insert into CUSTOMER_MASTER( CIN, NRIC, F_NAME, L_NAME, GENDER, DOB, CUST_CATEGORY, MAKER_ID, SEC_QUES, SEC_QUES_ANS, MEMBERSHIP_NO, CREATION_MODE, REG_STATUS, SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM, MOBILE_AT_REG, PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON, PRODUCT_TYPE) values ( #inp.form1[0].CIN, #inp.form1[0].NRIC, #inp.form1[0].F_NAME, #inp.form1[0].L_NAME, #inp.form1[0].GENDER, #inp.form1[0].DOB, #inp.form1[0].CUST_CATEGORY, #inp.form1[0].MAKER_ID, #inp.form1[0].SEC_QUES, #inp.form1[0].SEC_QUES_ANS, #inp.form1[0].MEMBERSHIP_NO, #inp.form1[0].CREATION_MODE, #inp.form1[0].REG_STATUS, #inp.form1[0].SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED, #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START, #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM, #inp.form1[0].MOBILE_AT_REG, #inp.form1[0].PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON, #inp.form1[0].PRODUCT_TYPE ) insert into CUSTOMER_MASTER( CIN, NRIC, F_NAME, L_NAME, GENDER, DOB, CUST_CATEGORY, MAKER_ID, SEC_QUES, SEC_QUES_ANS, MEMBERSHIP_NO, CREATION_MODE, REG_STATUS, SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM, MOBILE_AT_REG, PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON, PRODUCT_TYPE) values ( #inp.form1[0].CIN, #inp.form1[0].NRIC, #inp.form1[0].F_NAME, #inp.form1[0].L_NAME, #inp.form1[0].GENDER, #inp.form1[0].DOB, #inp.form1[0].CUST_CATEGORY, #inp.form1[0].MAKER_ID, #inp.form1[0].SEC_QUES, #inp.form1[0].SEC_QUES_ANS, #inp.form1[0].MEMBERSHIP_NO, #inp.form1[0].CREATION_MODE, #inp.form1[0].REG_STATUS, #inp.form1[0].SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED, #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START, #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM, #inp.form1[0].MOBILE_AT_REG, #inp.form1[0].PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON, #inp.form1[0].PRODUCT_TYPE ) delete from CUSTOMER_MASTER WHERE CIN = #inp.form1[0].CIN|STRING delete from CUSTOMER_MASTER WHERE CIN = #inp.form1[0].id|STRING update CUSTOMER_MASTER set NRIC = #inp.form1[0].NRIC, F_NAME = #inp.form1[0].F_NAME, L_NAME = #inp.form1[0].L_NAME, GENDER = #inp.form1[0].GENDER, DOB = #inp.form1[0].DOB, CUST_CATEGORY = #inp.form1[0].CUST_CATEGORY, MAKER_ID = #inp.form1[0].MAKER_ID, SEC_QUES = #inp.form1[0].SEC_QUES, SEC_QUES_ANS = #inp.form1[0].SEC_QUES_ANS, MEMBERSHIP_NO = #inp.form1[0].MEMBERSHIP_NO, CREATION_MODE = #inp.form1[0].CREATION_MODE, REG_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].REG_STATUS, SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED = #inp.form1[0].SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED = #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED = #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START = #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM = #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM, MOBILE_AT_REG = #inp.form1[0].MOBILE_AT_REG, PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON = #inp.form1[0].PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON, PRODUCT_TYPE = #inp.form1[0].PRODUCT_TYPE WHERE CIN=#inp.form1[0].CIN update CUSTOMER_MASTER set NRIC = #inp.form1[0].NRIC, F_NAME = #inp.form1[0].F_NAME, L_NAME = #inp.form1[0].L_NAME, GENDER = #inp.form1[0].GENDER, DOB = #inp.form1[0].DOB, CUST_CATEGORY = #inp.form1[0].CUST_CATEGORY, MAKER_ID = #inp.form1[0].MAKER_ID, SEC_QUES = #inp.form1[0].SEC_QUES, SEC_QUES_ANS = #inp.form1[0].SEC_QUES_ANS, MEMBERSHIP_NO = #inp.form1[0].MEMBERSHIP_NO, CREATION_MODE = #inp.form1[0].CREATION_MODE, REG_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].REG_STATUS, SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED = #inp.form1[0].SMS_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED = #inp.form1[0].EMAIL_BLAST_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED = #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSURANCE_SUBSCRIBED, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START = #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSUR_POLICY_YR_START, CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM = #inp.form1[0].CARD_INSUR_POLICY_NUM, MOBILE_AT_REG = #inp.form1[0].MOBILE_AT_REG, PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON = #inp.form1[0].PROG_UNSUBSCRIBED_REASON, PRODUCT_TYPE = #inp.form1[0].PRODUCT_TYPE WHERE CIN=#inp.form1[0].id|STRING
